duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and maintain the company's safety culture and oversee safety incidents, subcontractors, and workflow.
Manage company staff, subcontractors, suppliers, and project programs.
Coordinate project site care, manage the project schedule, and track project budget and costs.
Communicate project information to stakeholders and ensure project compliance.
Support project closeout and participate in project pursuits and negotiations.
Manage stand-alone projects, identify project risks, and manage project deliverables.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in construction management, engineering, or related field (Preferred)
